channel.title: TopGear
channel.description:
Last few weeks I've been enjoying it. Though, I thought there's no way all these coincidences can happen, example: Hammoud gets out of his car, then the car falls of the cliff like 3 seconds later. So, I thought I would search it up, as much of a good show it is, I just hate scripted shows. This is Infact Scripted, and most say "poorly Scripted". Now... that basically kills the only show I ever like about cars... Here's a quote of another forum:
the whole thing is scripted. Did you know that they don't use their real names? James May is actually Colin Daniels; Jeremy Clarkson is Gordon McIntosh and Richard Hammond is Brett Dagger. They all went to the same drama school in Poland and regularly appeared in plays, pantos and court rooms. Gordon shared the stage with the great Lord Olivier in late seventies. As well as selling fruit in the market in EastEnders during the 1980s, Gordon could often be seen in the background ruining various outside broadcasts. Colin mainly did Rep work, but was fortunate enough to sleep with the right people and has never looked back.
[img]http://estb.msn.com/i/44/F234734E11D03D50DD30AD4A2595CA.jpg[/img] Now come on.. :rolleyes: What's your thoughts?

item.title: TopGear
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

When I say Scripted I mean stuff like… The bads things happen when there in a safe area, I suggest you look it up, You will find a lot agreeing with me on this

Read full topic

item.title: TopGear
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

I don’t know where you’ve read this ‘scripted’ shit from but the shows humour is only scripted a little, which is blatantly obvious.

Also that comment on them having different aliases is total bullshit, you honestly think Jeremy Clarkson could act? Also, during the late 70’s Jeremy was trying to pursue a career in Journalism, he most definitely wasn’t in Poland during those times, he was still getting an education.

Read full topic

item.title: TopGear
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:1, topic:337519”]Here’s a quote of another forum:

[quote]
the whole thing is scripted. Did you know that they don’t use their real names? James May is actually Colin Daniels; Jeremy Clarkson is Gordon McIntosh and Richard Hammond is Brett Dagger.

They all went to the same drama school in Poland and regularly appeared in plays, pantos and court rooms. Gordon shared the stage with the great Lord Olivier in late seventies. As well as selling fruit in the market in EastEnders during the 1980s, Gordon could often be seen in the background ruining various outside broadcasts. Colin mainly did Rep work, but was fortunate enough to sleep with the right people and has never looked back.
[/quote][/quote]

It may or may not be scripted, but I think the above paragraph about the names is complete bullshit, unless the original writer of it, or anybody else, can prove me otherwise.

Read full topic

the whole thing is scripted. Did you know that they don’t use their real names? James May is actually Colin Daniels; Jeremy Clarkson is Gordon McIntosh and Richard Hammond is Brett Dagger.
[/quote][/quote]

That can’t be true…?

the whole thing is scripted. Did you know that they don't use their real names? James May is actually Colin Daniels; Jeremy Clarkson is Gordon McIntosh and Richard Hammond is Brett Dagger.

They all went to the same drama school in Poland and regularly appeared in plays, pantos and court rooms. Gordon shared the stage with the great Lord Olivier in late seventies.
